docs.snippet: In a new legal development on the controversy over former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton's emails, an appeals court on Tuesday reversed a lower court ruling and said two U.S. government agencies should have done more to recover the emails....
docs.lead_paragraph: In a new legal development on the controversy over former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton's emails, an appeals court on Tuesday reversed a lower court ruling and said two U.S. government agencies should have done more to recover the emails.

headline.main: U.S. Appeals Court Revives Clinton Email Suit
headline.print_headline: U.S. Appeals Court Revives Clinton Email Suit

docs.snippet: Donald Trump hammered rival Hillary Clinton during the presidential campaign for failing to prevent the attack on the U.S. mission in Benghazi, Libya, when she was secretary of state. Soon he'll be the one responsible for protecting America's dipl...
docs.lead_paragraph: Donald Trump hammered rival Hillary Clinton during the presidential campaign for failing to prevent the attack on the U.S. mission in Benghazi, Libya, when she was secretary of state. Soon he'll be the one responsible for protecting America's diplomats, but he's offered little insight into how he'll do that.

headline.main: Pressure's On for Trump to Make Diplomats Safer
headline.print_headline: Pressure's On for Trump to Make Diplomats Safer

docs.snippet: The Obama administration plans to announce on Thursday a series of retaliatory measures against Russia for hacking into U.S. political institutions and individuals and leaking information in an effort to help President-elect Donald Trump and ...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Obama administration plans to announce on Thursday a series of retaliatory measures against Russia for hacking into U.S. political institutions and individuals and leaking information in an effort to help President-elect Donald Trump and other Republican candidates, two U.S. officials said on Wednesday.

headline.main: U.S. Set to Announce Response to Russian Election Hacking: Sources
headline.print_headline: U.S. Set to Announce Response to Russian Election Hacking: Sources

docs.snippet: In a year with no shortage of surprises and stomach-churning turns in the market, stock investors can feel pretty good about 2016....
docs.lead_paragraph: In a year with no shortage of surprises and stomach-churning turns in the market, stock investors can feel pretty good about 2016.

headline.main: US Stocks Headed for Big Gains in 2016 Despite Early Stumble
headline.print_headline: US Stocks Headed for Big Gains in 2016 Despite Early Stumble
